attributes.additional_details:
Pregnant NHS boob job model Josie Cunningham won't stop smoking because she's having baby boy

http://www.mirror.co.uk/3am/celebrity-news/pregnant-nhs-boob-job-model-3781941#ixzz36LlDMNKm
Follow us: @DailyMirror on Twitter | DailyMirror on Facebook

I was horrified to read this story, the subject of the story is just pursuing fame at all costs, even the health of her unborn child! Can the government ask the newspapers not to print rubbish like this as it just encourages others of this ilk to behave in a similar manner.

Fame should require talent, not just outrageous behaviours and loose morals
